statements: SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%AT%';
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%ACGT%';
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%A%' OR sequence LIKE '%T%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sequences FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM species;
SELECT * FROM species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM species WHERE species_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT relationship_id, species1_id, species2_id, relationship_strength FROM evolutionary_relationship ORDER BY relationship_strength ASC;
SELECT * FROM evolutionary_relationship WHERE species1_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND species2_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT species_id, species_name, dna_sequence FROM species WHERE species_name = 'Human';
SELECT * FROM species WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, LENGTH(dna_sequence) AS sequence_length FROM species WHERE LENGTH(dna_sequence) > 100 ORDER BY sequence_length DESC;

SELECT s.species_name AS species1, er.relationship_strength, s2.species_name AS species2 FROM evolutionary_relationship er JOIN species s ON er.species1_id = s.species_id JOIN species s2 ON er.species2_id = s2.species_id ORDER BY relationship_strength DESC;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM species;
SELECT species_id, species_name, dna_sequence FROM species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM evolutionary_relationship ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT paper_title, authors FROM research_paper WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM species WHERE species_name LIKE '%cat%';
SELECT * FROM evolutionary_relationship WHERE similarity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT paper_title, authors, publication_date FROM research_paper WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT species_id_1, species_id_2, similarity_score FROM evolutionary_relationship WHERE species_id_1 <> species_id_2 ORDER BY similarity_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, gene_length FROM Gene ORDER BY gene_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM Alignment WHERE alignment_score > 95;
SELECT species1_id, species2_id, relationship_type FROM EvolutionaryRelationship WHERE relationship_type LIKE 'Common%';
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, gene_length FROM Gene WHERE gene_length > 100;
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM Species WHERE species_name LIKE 'H%';
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT alignment_score, sequence_alignment FROM Alignment WHERE gene_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1
SELECT gene_name, dna_sequence FROM Genes ORDER BY gene_name ASC
SELECT species_name, dna_sequence FROM Species WHERE species_id = 3
SELECT gene_name, dna_sequence FROM Genes WHERE gene_id = 2
SELECT * FROM Alignments ORDER BY species_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE species_name = 'Human';
SELECT gene_name, dna_sequence FROM Genes WHERE gene_id > 100 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, COUNT(alignment_id) AS alignment_count FROM Species LEFT JOIN Alignments ON Species.species_id = Alignments.species_id GROUP BY species_name ORDER BY alignment_count DESC;

SELECT gene_name, mutation_type, mutation_description FROM Genes INNER JOIN Mutations ON Genes.gene_id = Mutations.gene_id WHERE mutation_type = 'Deletion' ORDER BY gene_name ASC, mutation_description DESC;
SELECT * FROM PhylogeneticTree WHERE tree_structure LIKE '%((Homo sapiens)%' AND tree_description LIKE '%evolution%';
